title: Project Talon splash art and concept and ablities

embed.description: hamzilla15.deviantart.com/art/... <-Project Talon skin concept and abilities

body: Hey guys! So i drew another concept :P This time its project talon! with what his abilities would look like and splash art! Please tell me what you think!

replies.body:
how do you even draw
amazing

I can actually predict the future
